{"id":644385645,"lang":"cpp","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1645257569,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/644385645/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.size()<=1){\n            return s.size();\n        }\n        vector<char> v(128,0);\n        int l=0,r=0;\n        bool isre = false;\n        int ans = 0;\n        while(r<s.size()){\n            if(isre==false){\n                if(v[s[r]]>=1){\n                    isre = true;\n                }\n                if(isre!=true){\n                    ans = max(ans,r-l+1);\n                }\n                v[s[r]]++;\n                r++;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(v[s[l]]==1){\n                    isre = false;\n                }\n                v[s[l]]--;\n                l++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
